About Me

A dedicated and results-driven engineer with a passion for data and automation.

With over six years of experience as a Software Engineer, I specialize in designing and implementing scalable data solutions. My expertise lies in ETL pipelines, data automation, and leveraging Azure cloud services to solve complex business problems. As a certified Scrum Master, I excel in leading cross-functional teams to deliver high-impact projects ahead of schedule.

I am currently pursuing a Master's in Applied Data Science at Indiana University to deepen my knowledge in data analytics and machine learning. I am passionate about building efficient, automated systems that drive data-informed decision-making and operational excellence.

Master of Science, Applied Data Science

Indiana University, Indianapolis (Expected Dec 2025) - GPA: 4.0/4.0

Bachelor of Engineering, Electronics and Computer Engineering

CMR Institute of Technology, Bangalore (Jan 2018)

Professional Experience

My career journey and key accomplishments.

July 2022 – Aug 2024

Senior Software Engineer – Data Automation

Eurofins IT, Bangalore, India

  • Designed and implemented a scalable ETL pipeline for 38 Azure tenants using Python, Azure Data Factory, and Power BI.
  • Led a team of six as Scrum Master for a SharePoint data migration project, delivering ahead of schedule.
  • Developed a PowerApps app integrated with SQL Stored Procedures, automating data entry across 146 locations.
  • Automated the migration of 6TB of unstructured data from on-premises SharePoint to Azure.
  • Built M365 activity log ingestion pipelines, decreasing audit time by 70%.
June 2018 – June 2022

Software Engineer

Eurofins IT, Bangalore, India

  • Created Azure DevOps scheduled jobs to consolidate application logs from 18 servers into a unified database.
  • Developed the Eurofins travel request portal, reducing processing time from 10 days to 3 days.
  • Built a web app to manage and display dynamic email distribution lists (1600+ entries) for 60k+ users.

Featured Projects

A selection of my personal and academic work.

Sentiment Analysis Pipeline

Engineered a Python-based sentiment analysis pipeline that scraped Amazon & Peloton reviews using BeautifulSoup and PySpark, ingested data into PostgreSQL, and delivered interactive insights via a Streamlit dashboard.

View on GitHub

FIFA Striker Market Value Predictor

Developed a regression model leveraging player performance, physical attributes, and stats to forecast football strikers' market value, empowering smarter scouting and investment decisions.
